THE CORPORATION OF THE CITY OF BELLEVILLE

BY-LAW NUMBER __8610
A BY-LAW TO PROHIBIT THE INSTALLATION OF SUBSOIL DRAINS

WHEREAS paragraph 69 of subsection 1 of section 79 of the Municipal Act
authorizes councils to make regulations for sewage or drainage that may be deemed
necessary for sanitary purposes;

AND WHEREAS Council of The Corporation of the City of Belleville deems it
necessary for sanitary purposes to prohibit the connection of subsoil drains to the
municipal sanitary sewer system;

NOW, THEREFORE, COUNCIL OF THE CORPORATION OF THE CITY OF
BELLEVILLE ENACTS AS FOLLOWS:

1. No person shall make any installation the purpose of which is to discharge or
direct the flow of ground water into the municipal sanitary sewer system of The
Corporation of the City of Belleville.

2. Any person contravening the provisions of this By-law shall be liable upon
conviction to a fine of not more than $300.00 exclusive of costs.

3. By-law Number 8539 is hereby repealed.

THIS BY-LAW shall come into force and take effect immediately on and after the
passing thereof.

Read a first time this 3 day of December, 1968

Read a second time this 3 day of December, 1968

Read a third time and finally passed this 3 day of December, 1968.

(Sqgd.) J. Russell Scott

J. Russell Scott, Mayor

(Sgd.) Adam S. Stalker
Adam S. Stalker, Clerk
